definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建议设定一段试行期，并确定一个重新评估日期。

sentences.english: However, hair follicles that are in catagen or telogen growth phases are less pigmented .
sentences.chinese: 但是，毛囊处于退行期和休止期增长阶段不太色素。

sentences.english: We delayed our journey on account of the bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 因为天气恶劣，我们推迟了行期。

sentences.english: The project duration increased with the reduction in the size of resources.
sentences.chinese: 该项目执行期的增加而减少的规模资源。

sentences.english: The trial is being extended for six months.
sentences.chinese: 此提议的试行期已经被延长至六个月。

sentences.english: The first contract has a performance period of one year and could be extended.
sentences.chinese: 合同的执行期为一年，可以延长。

definition: to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
prices scissor (caught between low income and high prices)
